title: i often say WTF in match.
body:
usually my default response for dying or seeing something odd. 
is this bad?
i can't unlearn it.

replies.body:
Unless you literally have a chat log that looks like this within one minute:

WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF
WTF

That actually is punishable; because it is spamming. But the word on its own is fine.
hahah no i'm not that kinda guy.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
Deal's off, apparently you're still playing.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=UxPLgi8Z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-01-07T17:04:24.088+0000)
>
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
> Deal's off, apparently you're still playing.

i am not.
check my history.
and i do not like smurfs.

today i played a hour of POE, killed a pink rathain in MHW and got beat up while lagging in black mesa by the gonarch.

i'm also used to people not being honest.
forgive me if i feel like it will never happen.

i could ask riot to lock my account as proof.

Hmm... well keep it up then.

Riot *could* lock the account on request, but that's unnecessary.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=UxPLgi8Z,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2020-01-08T01:59:37.065+0000)
>
> Hmm... well keep it up then.
> 
> Riot *could* lock the account on request, but that's unnecessary.

i think you made a good point.
i do love the game.
but there is something about me that attracts the worst in others and myself.
best to take a long long break to help re evaluate my life.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=UxPLgi8Z,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2020-01-08T01:59:37.065+0000)
>
> Hmm... well keep it up then.
> 
> Riot *could* lock the account on request, but that's unnecessary.

1 month 1 week so far.
I am studying a course to teach English in asia.
I feel calmer.
More at peace.
Did not lock my account.
Did not log in.
it's not punishable if that's what you are asking

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=UxPLgi8Z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-07T15:33:26.675+0000)
>
> it's not punishable if that's what you are asking

thank you.
